医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
世界心脏日：心理健康支持对心血管疾病患者至关重要支持澳大利亚超过 400 万心血管疾病 (CVD) 患者的心理健康和福祉对于他们避免进一步心脏病或中风至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230930/World-Heart-Day-Mental-health-support-crucial-for-people-with-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230930/World-Heart-Day-Mental-health-support-crucial-for-people-with-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9885e3cb-74c5-4160-ae5e-342ab3131bb5 Sat, 30 Sep 2023 00:26:00 -0400 World Heart Day: Mental health support crucial for people with cardiovascular disease
新罕布什尔大学的研究旨在根据食物获取、纤维摄入量和肠道微生物群来量化健康结果美国肥胖流行继续对个人健康和社会经济福祉产生深远影响https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230930/UNH-research-seeks-to-quantify-health-outcomes-based-on-food-access-fibre-intake-and-gut-microbiota.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230930/UNH-research-seeks-to-quantify-health-outcomes-based-on-food-access-fibre-intake-and-gut-microbiota.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62020344-26b9-456f-a2c4-b4032038f19c Sat, 30 Sep 2023 00:21:00 -0400 UNH research seeks to quantify health outcomes based on food access, fiber intake and gut microbiota
采用人工智能和自动化可以简化癌症途径过程医学是一门不断发展的科学，微小的变化可能对患者的生活产生巨大影响。在癌症诊断和治疗方面，每一分钟都很重要。据欧盟委员会估计，到 2040 年，癌症发病率每年将影响超过 300 万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230930/Cancer-pathway-process-can-be-streamlined-with-the-adoption-of-AI-and-automation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230930/Cancer-pathway-process-can-be-streamlined-with-the-adoption-of-AI-and-automation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e05768e7-bc9c-47f2-b623-87e03607946e Sat, 30 Sep 2023 00:16:00 -0400 Cancer pathway process can be streamlined with the adoption of AI and automation
简单的指尖采血测试可以帮助识别数百万未确诊的糖尿病患者2019年，英国有近1.4万人因糖尿病相关死亡。这个数字看起来还会上升。英国目前有 430 万注册糖尿病患者，但伦敦医学实验室的最新分析显示，可能有超过 100 万英国人患有未确诊的 2 型糖尿病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230930/Simple-fingerprick-blood-test-could-help-to-identify-millions-of-people-with-undiagnosed-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230930/Simple-fingerprick-blood-test-could-help-to-identify-millions-of-people-with-undiagnosed-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63a53a95-482d-419e-8c5f-16c85ea983a5 Sat, 30 Sep 2023 00:15:00 -0400 Simple fingerprick blood test could help identify millions of people with undiagnosed diabetes
老年人体内的杀伤性 T 细胞对抗流感病毒的效果较差一项世界首创的发现揭示了老年人中针对流感病毒的特殊免疫细胞，称为“杀伤性 T 细胞”，与新生儿和儿童中发现的细胞非常相似，但难以识别受感染的细胞——这一发现释放了开发潜力针对不同年龄段的更好的疫苗和疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230930/Killer-T-cells-in-older-adults-found-to-be-less- effective-at-fighting-influenza-viruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230930/Killer-T-cells-in-older-adults-found-to-be-less- effective-at-fighting-influenza-viruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=493bfb1c-119b-49ca-b12f-6a1221b12092 Sat, 30 Sep 2023 00:11:00 -0400 Killer T cells in older adults found to be less effective at fighting influenza viruses
研究表明近亲可能会增加患2型糖尿病和其他常见疾病的风险一项新研究发现，近亲之间的血缘关系可能会增加患 2 型糖尿病和创伤后应激障碍 (PTSD) 等常见疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230930/Study-shows-consanguinity-may-raise-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-and-other-common-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230930/Study-shows-consanguinity-may-raise-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-and-other-common-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a266fc4-c34f-43a6-b0bb-4dfc1484428d Sat, 30 Sep 2023 00:08:00 -0400 Study shows consanguinity may raise risk of type 2 diabetes and other common diseases
社交媒体的使用与年轻女性对整容手术的接受度提高有关当凯莉·詹纳 (Kylie Jenner) 承认她标志性的撅嘴是唇部填充的结果时，人们对整容手术的兴趣和接受度显着增加。这就是社交媒体的力量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230930/Social-media-use-linked-to-higher-acceptance-of-cosmetic-surgery-among-young-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230930/Social-media-use-linked-to-higher-acceptance-of-cosmetic-surgery-among-young-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fda5c69-359d-4bcb-a24d-80654f7438d3 Sat, 30 Sep 2023 00:00:00 -0400 Social media use linked to higher acceptance of cosmetic surgery among young women
研究发现癌细胞劫持增强子DNA以加快生长速度多伦多大学的研究人员发现，癌细胞可以通过劫持组织和器官形成时通常使用的增强子 DNA 来增强肿瘤的生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Cancer-cells-hijack-enhancer-DNA-to-grow-faster-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Cancer-cells-hijack-enhancer-DNA-to-grow-faster-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8164ee1e-4ede-4a3a-a744-5670ed08711d Fri, 29 Sep 2023 23:12:00 -0400 Cancer cells hijack enhancer DNA to grow faster, study finds
研究发现，产后个体更有可能承担医疗债务对于一些家庭来说，产后一年可能不仅意味着大量的尿布，还意味着一堆未付的医疗费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Postpartum-individuals-more-likely-to-have-medical-debt-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Postpartum-individuals-more-likely-to-have-medical-debt-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa875d1b-c311-4354-8d75-8673437a617f Fri, 29 Sep 2023 22:23:18 -0400 Postpartum individuals more likely to have medical debt, study finds
生活满意度可能不是认知健康的万能解决方案大量研究表明，过上充实和满意的生活可以通过鼓励身体活动和减轻压力等健康保护行为来改善认知功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Life-satisfaction-may-not-be-a-one-size-fits-all-solution-for-cognitive-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230929/Life-satisfaction-may-not-be-a-one-size-fits-all-solution-for-cognitive-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=383bd213-d3be-4d11-9a3a-52705b0b79d9 Fri, 29 Sep 2023 21:49:14 -0400 Life satisfaction may not be a one-size-fits-all solution for cognitive health
